'''1.7'''<ref name=":0"/> was a server version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released for client version [[Classic 0.0.19a_06|0.0.19a_06]] on June 20, 2009.

== Additions ==
* Added server support for {{cmd|tp}} as an alias for {{cmd|teleport}}.<ref name=":0"/>
